# Unit 3

Welcome to Unit 3! This unit covers the Classical Era, which in practice is going to mean the music of Haydn and Mozart. We'll focus on harmonic analysis and the study of form.

# Assignments

  • Homework 8 (due 11/5)
  • Homework 9 (due 11/9)
  • Homework 10 (due 11/15)
  • Homework 11 (due 11/28)
  • Project 3 (due 12/3)
    • Instructions
    • Score
    • Handout with Sample Reductions

# Handouts

  • Small Rounded Binary forms
  • Larger Rounded Binary forms
  • Sonata form
  • Haydn Symphony 104 Analysis
  • Development Analyses
  • Enharmonic Reinterpretation
  • Concerto Sonata Form
  • Variations
  • Rondo Forms

# Additional Scores

  • Mozart, Piano Concerto in CM, K.467, i. Allegro maestoso
  • Mozart, Symphony no. 40 in Gm, K.550, iii. Menuetto & Trio

# Listening List

  • Haydn, Sonata in CM, Hob. XVI/7

    • i, Allegro moderato
    • ii, Menuetto & Trio
    • iii, Allegro

  • Haydn, Symphony no. 45 ("Farewell")

    • i, Allegro assai

  • Haydn, Quartet in B-flat, Op. 76/4 ("Sunrise")

    • i, Allegro con spirito

  • Haydn, Symphony no. 104 in DM

    • Movement 1
      • Introduction (Adagio)
      • Exposition (Allegro): P TR S C
      • Development - Retransition
      • Recapitulation: P TR S C
      • Coda
    • Movement 3, Menuetto and Trio

  • Mozart, Quartet in GM, K.156

    • i, Presto
    • ii, Adagio
    • iii, Menuetto

  • Mozart, Sonata in CM, K.309

    • i, Allegro con spirito
    • ii, Andante un poco adagio
    • iii, Rondeau. Allegretto grazioso

  • Mozart, Sonata in DM, K.311

    • i, Allegro con spirito

  • Mozart, Sonata in FM, K.332

    • i, Allegro

  • Mozart, Quartet in Dm, K.421, i (Allegro)

    • Exposition: P TR S C
    • Development: P (m.42) P (m.53) S (m.59) Retransition (m.66)
    • Recapitulation: P TR S C
    • Coda

  • Mozart, Quartet in GM, K.387, i

    • Exposition: P TR (m.11) S (m.25) C (m.39)
    • Development - Retransition (m.101)
    • Recapitulation

  • Mozart, Concerto in GM, K.453

    • i, Allegro
    • ii, Andante
    • iii, Allegretto - Presto

  • Mozart, Concerto in CM, K.467

    • i, Allegro moderato

  • Mozart, The Marriage of Figaro

    • Act II, "Susana, or via sortite"

  • Mozart, Symphony no. 40 in Gm, K.550, i

    • Exposition: P TR (m.20) S (m.44) C (m.66)
    • Development - Retransition
    • Recapitulation: P TR S C
    • Coda

# Terminology and Concepts

# Techniques

  • Standing on the dominant
  • Enharmonic reinterpretation

# Genres

  • Symphony
  • Sonata
  • Quartet
  • Opera
  • Minuet

# Forms

  • Binary form
    • First reprise, Second reprise
    • Digression
    • Double return
  • Sonata form
    • Exposition (& P, TR, S, C)
    • Development, Retransition
    • Recapitulation
    • Coda
  • Concerto Sonata Form
    • Orchestral Exposition
    • Solo Exposition
  • Variations
